title: National Building Code to apply- The display of advertising signs and outdoor display structures on buildings and land shall be in accordance with Part X-Signs and Outdoor Display Structures, National Building Code of India as amended from time to time
clause_text: National Building Code to apply- The display of advertising signs and outdoor display structures on buildings and land shall be in accordance with Part X-Signs and Outdoor Display Structures, National Building Code of India as amended from time to time.
